counterreport.description: Post a new counter tracing report.

AckInUnknownState.description: Counter for sending FIN ACK received in unknown connection state.

AckInvalidFormat.description: Counter for ACK packet dropped because of invalid format.

AckRejected.description: Counter for ACK packets rejected as per policy.

AckSigValidationFailed.description: Counter for ACK packet dropped because signature validation failed.

AckTCPNoTCPAuthOption.description: Counter for TCP authentication option not found.

ContextIDNotFound.description: Counter for unable to find ContextID.

DroppedExternalService.description:
Counter for no ACLs found for external services. Dropping application SYN
packet.

InvalidSynAck.description: Counter for processing unit is already dead - drop SYN ACK packet.

MarkNotFound.description: Counter for processing unit mark not found.

NetSynNotSeen.description: Counter for network SYN packet was not seen.

NoConnFound.description: Counter for no context or connection found.

NonPUTraffic.description: Counter for traffic that belongs to a non-processing unit process.

OutOfOrderSynAck.description: Counter for SYN ACK for flow with processed FIN ACK.

RejectPacket.description: Counter for reject the packet as per policy.

ServicePostprocessorFailed.description: Counter for post service processing failed for network packet.

ServicePreprocessorFailed.description: Counter for network packets that failed preprocessing.

SynAckBadClaims.description: Counter for SYN ACK packet dropped because of bad claims.

SynAckClaimsMisMatch.description: Counter for SYN ACK packet dropped because of encryption mismatch.

SynAckDroppedExternalService.description: Counter for SYN ACK from external service dropped.

SynAckInvalidFormat.description: Counter for SYN ACK packet dropped because of invalid format.

SynAckMissingClaims.description: Counter for SYN ACK packet dropped because of no claims.

SynAckMissingToken.description: Counter for SYN ACK packet dropped because of missing token.

SynAckNoTCPAuthOption.description: Counter for TCP authentication option not found.

SynAckRejected.description: Counter for dropping because of reject rule on transmitter.

SynDroppedInvalidFormat.description: Counter for SYN packet dropped because of invalid format.

SynDroppedInvalidToken.description: Counter for SYN packet dropped because of invalid token.

SynDroppedNoClaims.description: Counter for SYN packet dropped because of no claims.

SynDroppedTCPOption.description: Counter for TCP authentication option not found.

SynRejectPacket.description: Counter for SYN packet dropped due to policy.

SynUnexpectedPacket.description: Counter for received SYN packet from unknown processing unit.

TCPAuthNotFound.description: Counter for TCP authentication option not found.

UDPAckInvalidSignature.description: Counter for UDP ACK packet dropped due to an invalid signature.

UDPConnectionsProcessed.description: Counter for number of processed UDP connections.

UDPDropContextNotFound.description: Counter for dropped UDP data packets with no context.

UDPDropFin.description: Counter for dropped UDP FIN handshake packets.

UDPDropInNfQueue.description: Counter for dropped UDP in NfQueue.

UDPDropNoConnection.description: Counter for dropped UDP data packets with no connection.

UDPDropPacket.description: Counter for dropped UDP data packets.

UDPDropQueueFull.description: Counter for dropped UDP queue full.

UDPDropSynAck.description: Counter for dropped UDP SYN ACK handshake packets.

UDPInvalidNetState.description: Counter for UDP packets received in invalid network state.

UDPPostProcessingFailed.description: Counter for UDP packets failing postprocessing.

UDPPreProcessingFailed.description: Counter for UDP packets failing preprocessing.

UDPRejected.description: Counter for UDP packets dropped due to policy.

UDPSynAckDropBadClaims.description: Counter for UDP SYN ACK packets dropped due to bad claims.

UDPSynAckMissingClaims.description: Counter for UDP SYN ACK packets dropped due to missing claims.

UDPSynAckPolicy.description: Counter for UDP SYN ACK packets dropped due to bad claims.

UDPSynDrop.description: Counter for dropped UDP SYN transmits.

UDPSynDropPolicy.description: Counter for dropped UDP SYN policy.

UDPSynInvalidToken.description: Counter for dropped UDP FIN handshake packets.

UDPSynMissingClaims.description: Counter for UDP SYN packet dropped due to missing claims.

connectionsAnalyzed.description:
Non-zero counter indicates analyzed connections for unencrypted, encrypted,
and packets from endpoint applications with the TCP Fast Open option set. These
are not dropped counter.

connectionsDropped.description:
Non-zero counter indicates dropped connections because of invalid state,
non-processing unit traffic, or out of order packets.

connectionsExpired.description:
Non-zero counter indicates expired connections because of response not being
received within a certain amount of time after the request is made.

droppedPackets.description:
Non-zero counter indicates dropped packets that did not hit any of our iptables
rules and queue drops.

encryptionFailures.description: Non-zero counter indicates encryption processing failures of data packets.

enforcerID.description: Identifier of the enforcer sending the report.

enforcerNamespace.description:
Namespace of the enforcer sending the report. This field is deprecated. Use the
'namespace' field instead.
field instead.

externalNetworkConnections.description:
Non-zero counter indicates connections going to and from external networks.
These may be drops or allowed counters.

namespace.description: Namespace of the enforcer sending the report.

policyDrops.description: Non-zero counter indicates packets dropped due to a reject policy.

processingUnitID.description: PUID is the ID of the processing unit reporting the counter.

processingUnitNamespace.description: Namespace of the processing unit reporting the counter.

timestamp.description: Timestamp is the date of the report.

tokenDrops.description:
Non-zero counter indicates packets rejected due to anything related to token
creation/parsing failures.
